name: Iron Man Multiple Choice Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Everyone knows that Iron Man is actually wealthy playboy Tony Stark, but what was the name of the scientist he was trapped with?
questions.explanation:
Ho Yinsen.

	Originally, Ho Yinsen's name was simply Yin Sen, but it was later changed to Ho Yinsen. Lo Mein is actually a Chinese dish that is a staple of the Chinese diners in my city. Wong Chu was the evil warlord who captured young Stark.

questions.text: To the public, what is Stark's relationship to Iron Man?
options: Iron Man is funded by Stark International
Stark and Iron Man are old college friends
The public is not aware of any relationship
questions.explanation:
Iron Man is Stark's bodyguard.

	In the mid-2000's, Tony revealed himself as Iron Man and became the Secretary of Defense. After the events of the "Avengers Disassembled", Stark stated publicly that he would step down as Iron Man, but he secretly continues to don the armor.

questions.text: The Black Widow, one of Iron Man's earlier villains, defected to the United States.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Black Widow is Natasha Romanova, a hero who has had a romantic relationship with Daredevil and even served with the Avengers. She has also worked for S.H.I.E.L.D.

questions.text: In what issue of "Tales of Suspense" did Stark swap his gold armor for his sleeker, more recognized red and gold armor?
questions.explanation:
#48.

	Iron Man debuted in "Tales of Suspense" #39 with grey armor. He ditched that model for a bulky gold suit in #40. In issue #48 Stark created the familiar red and gold armor, and after issue #99, "Tales of Suspense" became "Captain America".

questions.text: Throughout his life, Stark has battled his dependency on what substance?
questions.explanation:
Alcohol.

	A recurring battle in Iron Man's life is that of alcohol abuse. Another superhero who has had an alcohol addiction is Carol Danvers, who has been known as Warbird and Ms. Marvel. She has also been a member of the Avengers.

questions.text: Stark designed the Variable Threat Response Battle Suit, which is better known as: _________.
questions.explanation:
War Machine.

	War Machine is a suit mainly worn by Jim Rhodes, Stark's friend and confidante. A heavier-armed suit than the Iron Man suit, War Machine was painted silver and black.

questions.text: Under manipulation from Immortus, Stark killed what Avenger's member?
questions.explanation:
Yellowjacket (Rita DeMara).

	Immortus had been mentally manipulating Stark for many months. Under his control, Stark killed a nanny and the female Yellowjacket. Eventually freed of the mind control, Stark sacrificed himself to stop Immortus. A teenaged version of Stark later grew to the original Stark's approximate age and gained the memories of the original Stark.

questions.text: Like some other superheroes, Tony Stark is an orphan.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Stark's parents were killed in a car crash, at which time Tony inherited the family fortune and the family business. One of the first things he did was to buy the company who made the faulty brakes and fix the problem.

questions.text: Which of these women has Stark NOT been romantically involved with?
questions.explanation:
Carol Danvers.

	Whitney Frost and Bethany Cabe were some of Stark's many girlfriends in the mainstream Marvel universe, and in the Ultimate Marvel universe, Stark was romantically linked with Natasha Romanova, the Black Widow. Carol Danvers and Tony Stark have flirted, but it has never gone beyond that.

questions.text: During the Iron Wars, Stark, in the Iron Man suit, accidentally killed this other armored adventurer: ____________.
questions.explanation:
Titanium Man.

	Titanium Man has been the name taken by several armor-clad supervillains in the Marvel Universe. The one killed in the Armor Wars was otherwise known as Gremlin, and the most recent Titanium Man was hired to attack Tony Stark as he argued for all superheroes to register themselves with the federal government. Staged by Stark himself, he meant to demonstrate the need for such a bill.
